mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_school_brokerage_sa ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, handling_date, user_id, school_id, student_code, start_date, end_date, tuition_fee, first_term_tuition_fee, commission, gst, deduct_gst, bonus, pay_date, invoice_code, pay_amount, subagency_id, adviser_id, official_id, is_settle_accounts, is_close) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{handlingDate}, #{userId}, #{schoolId}, #{studentCode}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{tuitionFee}, #{firstTermTuitionFee}, #{commission}, #{gst}, #{deductGst}, #{bonus}, #{payDate}, #{invoiceCode}, #{payAmount}, #{subagencyId}, #{adviserId}, #{officialId}, 0, 0);
mapper.select: SELECT bsbs.id AS id, bsbs.gmt_create AS gmtCreate, bsbs.handling_date AS handlingDate, tbu.id AS userId, tbu.name AS userName, tbu.birthday AS birthday, tbu.phone AS phone, bs.id AS schoolId, bs.name AS schoolName, tba.id AS adviserId, tba.name AS adviserName, bo.id AS officialId, bo.name AS officialName FROM b_school_brokerage_sa bsbs, b_school bs, tb_user tbu, tb_adviser tba, b_official bo WHERE bsbs.school_id = bs.id AND bsbs.user_id = tbu.id AND bsbs.adviser_id = tba.id AND bsbs.official_id = bo.id AND bsbs.is_close = 0 AND bsbs.invoice_code is null ORDER BY bsbs.gmt_create DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{rows};

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, handling_date AS handlingDate, user_id AS userId, school_id AS schoolId, student_code AS studentCode, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, tuition_fee AS tuitionFee, first_term_tuition_fee AS firstTermTuitionFee, commission, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, pay_date AS payDate, invoice_code AS invoiceCode, pay_amount AS payAmount, subagency_id AS subagencyId, adviser_id AS adviserId, official_id AS officialId, is_settle_accounts AS isSettleAccounts, is_close AS isClose FROM b_school_brokerage_sa WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_school_brokerage_sa WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
